category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_Multisite_tcxml_TOS_Mapping
preference.preference_description: Specifies the maps for Transfer Option Sets (TOSs) between the exporting site and the importing site. Currently, the primary use of the preference is for TC XML based Multi-Site post-action support during import to execute the actions registered in the import transfer mode. Valid values are in the format "ExportingSiteOptionSet,ImportingSiteOptionSet", where: * ExportingSiteOptionSet is the option set to be used for export. * ImportingSiteOptionSet is the option set to be used during import.
